meanings.definition: Make (something) resistant to the effects of bad weather.
meanings.sent1: I weatherproofed my tent before the camping trip.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers weatherproofed the roof to prevent leaks.
meanings.sent3: The umbrella was weatherproofed, so even the storm couldn't ruin our picnic.
meanings.sent4: She weatherproofed her heart against the harsh words of others.
meanings.sent5: Weatherproofing your belongings is essential for outdoor adventures.

meanings.definition: The process of making something resistant to the effects of bad weather.
meanings.sent1: Weatherproofing is crucial for protecting outdoor furniture.
meanings.sent2: The weatherproofing of the house saved it from the heavy rain.
meanings.sent3: The weatherproofing on the car made it look like a shiny raincoat.
meanings.sent4: His weatherproofing of the garden was like a shield against the elements.
meanings.sent5: The weatherproofing of the boat kept it safe during the storm.
